A6.text: Conduction is the main mode of heat transfer for solid materials because the strong inter-molecular forces allow the vibrations of particles to be easily transmitted, in comparison to liquids and gases.

A7.text: For example, heat is conducted from the hotplate of an electric stove to the bottom of a saucepan in contact with it.
